Articles.Content: Certainly hope this didn't die out. It looks to be a very promising mod. Just an update on the status of this mod will do for now.

Dead threads, I know, but this is too awesome.

Maybe someone else can export it? I would If I knew how to do it with 3ds max - afaik the exporter is for blender, and I am only familiar with max.

Models are really good, making this level of detail would take me somewhere up to a 50 hours.

As for stock-SLS - the solution is easy. Make this one size larger, 5 meters rocket and so on.

Edited November 16, 2014 by sashan

Dead threads, I know, but this is too awesome.

Maybe someone else can export it? I would If I knew how to do it with 3ds max - afaik the exporter is for blender, and I am only familiar with max.

Models are really good, making this level of detail would take me somewhere up to a 50 hours.

As for stock-SLS - the solution is easy. Make this one size larger, 5 meters rocket and so on.

It is just a shame. But it's prob dead.
Darn shame this is dead, I remember seeing another SLS/Orion dev thread somewhere that was of the same excellent quality, anyone else remember what I'm talking about?

Darn shame this is dead, I remember seeing another SLS/Orion dev thread somewhere that was of the same excellent quality, anyone else remember what I'm talking about?

Perhaps this is what you were thinking of [updated 4/18/15] - http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85275-WIP-NASA-SLS-Released-Orion-MPCV-Core-Module-1-0-4-18-2015?highlight=Orion

WOW! those parts are even rivaling NASA 3d models!

-edit

I know this is dead but you have to give props to this guy.

Edited June 7, 2015 by Noah_Blade
